eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing

Class RoadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing.RoadManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GoogleRoadManager, MapQuestRoadManager, OSRMRoadManager

    public abstract class RoadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic class to get a route between a start and a destination point, going through a list of waypoints.
    Author:
    M.Kergall
    See Also:
    MapQuestRoadManager, GoogleRoadManager, OSRMRoadManager

      • addRequestOption

        public void addRequestOption(java.lang.String requestOption)
        Add an option that will be used in the route request. Note that some options are set in the request in all cases.
        Parameters:
        requestOption - see provider documentation. Just one example: "routeType=bicycle" for MapQuest; "mode=bicycling" for Google.
